__e: So Baker's in on it, too, huh?
You mean, you employ Mr. Baker as your attorney but you can't walk down the street with him?
Oh, yes. Mr. Baker's in his study.
We should be up on Miller Drive beside that pool Mr. Baker built for you.
The jury disagreed with you. And Mr. Baker was found not guilty by reason of insanity.
I followed my husband to Baker Street and then came to you myself in order to understand the full enormity of the offence.
Well it'll be nice to get home to Baker Street, hey Holmes?
None that I can think of, apart from the fact that
Baker and the police have ruled the case closed, all in the public interest, of course.
My name is Frank Baker and you know my brother Jack.
"For Mrs. Henry Baker," and obviously, not your hat.
